ComicInfo.Summary:
Julie meets a scientist from HeNRI, she finally learns the secret behind the Beta Suit metal she's wearing, and why the Phi Project is only the tip of a catastrophic iceberg!
Julie dreams of being naked and flying when 2 black demons swoop in and fire at her with flaming jets of energy. She dives for the ground and 180s as the energy hits the ground and she sores straight up. The demons are still coming and envelope her. She wakes with a start in the cabin of the trunk.
Dillon and Julie discuss the days events and Julie remains adamant she cannot control the suit.
Ivy is at the motel and deduces much of what happened, including that there was someone else there who was attacking Julie, and with the girl from the diner she gets a positive ID on her target.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-27 14:42:31. [CVDB151280]
ComicInfo.Characters: Dillon Murphy, Ivy M. Raven, Julie Martin
